note:
Scientist, physics lecturer, amateur astronomer, bookworm, sf fan, sports enthusiast.

Profile name originates from Heinlein's "The Moon Is a Harsh Mistress", which is one of my favorites. Background photo: view from Teide volcano, Tenerife.

I write / read / boost on science, politics, hiking, nature, and occasionally on other topics I find interesting.

fields.name: he / him
fields.value: or anything you like, as long as respectful
